Articles.Content:
I'm experiencing an odd issue, i hope i can get help here. I can't play this game at all at the moment. I've tried the 0.90 version on this machine and it seems fine (however i have had the same issue here as well, just not as often). When launching 1.0 from steam, the image will freeze on the screen but the game keeps running. Happens at different times, once i managed to get to the space academy! for a clear description this is what happens.

For example. I click on the space academy, it loads fine. 

I click back to go back to the space center. 

It loads, the sounds load but the image on the screen stays as the space academy image with the pilot listings.

I can click on the screen where the other building would be in the space center and it loads into them however the image again stays on the same space academy screen.

this is frustrating as hell. the same issue happened with the initial load screen as well where the game switched to the title menu and the image on the screen didn't update at all. I hope there is a quick easy fix for this.

My specs are as follows:

CPU: I5 4690k

Ram: 8gb 2133mhz ram

Mobo: Asus Z97-A

HDD: WD Blue 1 TB

GPU: EVGA GTX 970 SSC (with latest drivers)

OS: Windows 7 Professional 64 bit

help plox, i wants to play my ksp again ![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif)

- - - Updated - - -

looking in my log file i find this....

[WRN 00:36:26.375] HighlightingSystem : Framebuffer depth data is not available and can't be used to occlude highlighting. Highlighting occluders enabled.

this is seriously messed up. i completely deleted all the game files and reinstalled, tried using the launcher and ksp.exe, both still have issues.... i managed to get a rocket built.... only to spin the camera on the launch pad and have the game crash. what the hell is going on with this.....

- - - Updated - - -

i found the cause. apparently evga percision x hates this game.
